mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_display_menu (id, name, key, url, level, icon_id, forbid, parent_id, long_code, create_time, modified_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{key}, #{url}, #{level}, #{iconId}, #{forbid}, #{parentId}, #{longCode}, #{createTime}, #{modifiedTime})
